sections.heading: API Versioning
sections.content: Version APIs using URL path (/v1/users), query parameters (?version=1), or headers (Accept: application/vnd.api+json;version=1). Maintain backward compatibility and provide clear migration guides.

sections.heading: OAuth 2.0 Implementation - Authentication
sections.content: Implement OAuth 2.0 authorization flow with proper scope management, token validation, and refresh token handling. Use PKCE for public clients and validate redirect URIs to prevent attacks.
